suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: Cheddar is a goldfish cat toy. Yes, that kind of goldfish, the ones Pepperidge Farm makes. He is without ornamentation for kitty safety, felted for durability and filled with catnip. He is a super easy knit, made in one piece and requiring only knowledge of knit and purl, increase and decrease. Please feel free to attach a stick and string to Cheddar if you would prefer one of those “fishing” type cat toys! Gauge is listed pre-felting. Other notions needed: darning needle, sewing needle, matching thread, catnip (5-10 grams)
name: Ravelry: Cheddar the Goldfish pattern by Frances Gillespie
